revised_title: Development and Comparative Morphology of the Chondrocranium in Bony Fishes
tldr: This paper describes the development stages of the chondrocranium in the common eel (Anguilla vulgaris) and provides a comparative account of chondrocranial development in bony fishes, focusing on teleosts. The study examines the ontogeny of the chondrocranium in various fish species and discusses the morphology of the ethmoid region, roof of the chondrocranium, and visceral arches.
